verses.verse: Then the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Go <WH935> <WH8798> in unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, and tell <WH1696> <WH8765> him, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of the Hebrews <WH5680>, Let my people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8761>, that they may serve <WH5647> <WH8799> me.
For if thou refuse <WH3986> to let them go <WH7971> <WH8763>, and wilt hold <WH2388> <WH8688> them still,

Behold, the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> is <WH1961> <WH8802> upon thy cattle <WH4735> which is in the field <WH7704>, upon the horses <WH5483>, upon the asses <WH2543>, upon the camels <WH1581>, upon the oxen <WH1241>, and upon the sheep <WH6629>: there shall be a very <WH3966> grievous <WH3515> murrain <WH1698>.

And the YY <WH3068> shall sever <WH6395> <WH8689> between the cattle <WH4735> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> and the cattle <WH4735> of Egypt <WH4714>: and there shall nothing <WH1697> die <WH4191> <WH8799> of all that is the children's <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And the YY <WH3068> appointed <WH7760> <WH8799> a set time <WH4150>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, To morrow <WH4279> the YY <WH3068> shall do <WH6213> <WH8799> this thing <WH1697> in the land <WH776>.

And the YY <WH3068> did <WH6213> <WH8799> that thing <WH1697> on the morrow <WH4283>, and all the cattle <WH4735> of Egypt <WH4714> died <WH4191> <WH8799>: but of the cattle <WH4735> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> died <WH4191> <WH8804> not one <WH259>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> sent <WH7971> <WH8799>, and, behold, there was not one <WH259> of the cattle <WH4735> of the Yisra'ELites <WH3478> dead <WH4191> <WH8804>. And the heart <WH3820> of Pharaoh <WH6547> was hardened <WH3513> <WH8799>, and he did not let the people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8765>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872> and unto Aharon <WH175>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> to you handfuls <WH2651> <WH4393> of ashes <WH6368> of the furnace <WH3536>, and let Mosheh <WH4872> sprinkle <WH2236> <WH8804> it toward the heaven <WH8064> in the sight <WH5869> of Pharaoh <WH6547>.

And it shall become small dust <WH80> in all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and shall be a boil <WH7822> breaking forth <WH6524> <WH8802> with blains <WH76> upon man <WH120>, and upon beast <WH929>, throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And they took <WH3947> <WH8799> ashes <WH6368> of the furnace <WH3536>, and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> before <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>; and Mosheh <WH4872> sprinkled <WH2236> <WH8799> it up toward heaven <WH8064>; and it became a boil <WH7822> breaking forth <WH6524> <WH8802> with blains <WH76> upon man <WH120>, and upon beast <WH929>.

And the magicians <WH2748> could <WH3201> <WH8804> not stand <WH5975> <WH8800> before <WH6440> Mosheh <WH4872> because <WH6440> of the boils <WH7822>; for the boil <WH7822> was upon the magicians <WH2748>, and upon all the Egyptians <WH4714>.

And the YY <WH3068> hardened <WH2388> <WH8762> the heart <WH3820> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, and he hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> not unto them; as the YY <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> unto Mosheh <WH4872>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Rise up early <WH7925> <WH8685> in the morning <WH1242>, and stand <WH3320> <WH8690> before <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto him, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of the Hebrews <WH5680>, Let my people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8761>, that they may serve <WH5647> <WH8799> me.

For I will at this time <WH6471> send <WH7971> <WH8802> all my plagues <WH4046> upon thine heart <WH3820>, and upon thy servants <WH5650>, and upon thy people <WH5971>; that thou mayest know <WH3045> <WH8799> that there is none like me in all the earth <WH776>.

For now I will stretch out <WH7971> <WH8804> my hand <WH3027>, that I may smite <WH5221> <WH8686> thee and thy people <WH5971> with pestilence <WH1698>; and thou shalt be cut off <WH3582> <WH8735> from the earth <WH776>.

And in very <WH199> deed <WH5668> for this cause have I raised thee up <WH5975> <WH8689>, for to shew <WH7200> <WH8687> in thee my power <WH3581>; and that my name <WH8034> may be declared <WH5608> <WH8763> throughout all the earth <WH776>.
As yet exaltest <WH5549> <WH8706> thou thyself against my people <WH5971>, that thou wilt not let them go <WH7971> <WH8763> ?

Behold, to morrow <WH4279> about this time <WH6256> I will cause it to rain <WH4305> <WH8688> a very <WH3966> grievous <WH3515> hail <WH1259>, such as hath not been <WH3644> in Egypt <WH4714> since <WH4480> the foundation <WH3117> <WH3245> <WH8736> thereof even until now.

Send <WH7971> <WH8798> therefore now, and gather <WH5756> <WH8685> thy cattle <WH4735>, and all that thou hast in the field <WH7704>; for upon every man <WH120> and beast <WH929> which shall be found <WH4672> <WH8735> in the field <WH7704>, and shall not be brought <WH622> <WH8735> home <WH1004>, the hail <WH1259> shall come down <WH3381> <WH8804> upon them, and they shall die <WH4191> <WH8804>.

He that feared <WH3373> the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> among the servants <WH5650> of Pharaoh <WH6547> made his servants <WH5650> and his cattle <WH4735> flee <WH5127> <WH8689> into the houses <WH1004>:
And he that regarded <WH7760> <WH8804> <WH3820> not the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> left <WH5800> <WH8799> his servants <WH5650> and his cattle <WH4735> in the field <WH7704>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Stretch forth <WH5186> <WH8798> thine hand <WH3027> toward heaven <WH8064>, that there may be hail <WH1259> in all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, upon man <WH120>, and upon beast <WH929>, and upon every herb <WH6212> of the field <WH7704>, throughout the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> stretched forth <WH5186> <WH8799> his rod <WH4294> toward heaven <WH8064>: and the YY <WH3068> sent <WH5414> <WH8804> thunder <WH6963> and hail <WH1259>, and the fire <WH784> ran along <WH1980> <WH8799> upon the ground <WH776>; and the YY <WH3068> rained <WH4305> <WH8686> hail <WH1259> upon the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

So there was hail <WH1259>, and fire <WH784> <WH3947> <WH8693> mingled <WH8432> with the hail <WH1259>, very <WH3966> grievous <WH3515>, such as there was none <WH3808> like it in all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> since it became a nation <WH1471>.

And the hail <WH1259> smote <WH5221> <WH8686> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> all that was in the field <WH7704>, both man <WH120> and beast <WH929>; and the hail <WH1259> smote <WH5221> <WH8689> every herb <WH6212> of the field <WH7704>, and brake <WH7665> <WH8765> every tree <WH6086> of the field <WH7704>.
Only in the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>, where the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were, was there no hail <WH1259>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> sent <WH7971> <WH8799>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> for Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, I have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> this time <WH6471>: the YY <WH3068> is righteous <WH6662>, and I and my people <WH5971> are wicked <WH7563>.

Intreat <WH6279> <WH8685> the YY <WH3068> (for it is enough <WH7227> ) that there be no more mighty <WH430> thunderings <WH6963> and hail <WH1259>; and I will let you go <WH7971> <WH8762>, and ye shall stay <WH5975> <WH8800> no longer <WH3254> <WH8686>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, As soon as I am gone out <WH3318> <WH8800> of the city <WH5892>, I will spread abroad <WH6566> <WH8799> my hands <WH3709> unto the YY <WH3068>; and the thunder <WH6963> shall cease <WH2308> <WH8799>, neither shall there be any more hail <WH1259>; that thou mayest know <WH3045> <WH8799> how that the earth <WH776> is the YY'S <WH3068>.
But as for thee and thy servants <WH5650>, I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that ye will not yet fear <WH3372> <WH8799> <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430>.
And the flax <WH6594> and the barley <WH8184> was smitten <WH5221> <WH8795>: for the barley <WH8184> was in the ear <WH24>, and the flax <WH6594> was bolled <WH1392>.
But the wheat <WH2406> and the rie <WH3698> were not smitten <WH5221> <WH8795>: for they <WH2007> were not grown up <WH648>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> of the city <WH5892> from Pharaoh <WH6547>, and spread abroad <WH6566> <WH8799> his hands <WH3709> unto the YY <WH3068>: and the thunders <WH6963> and hail <WH1259> ceased <WH2308> <WH8799>, and the rain <WH4306> was not poured <WH5413> <WH8738> upon the earth <WH776>.

And when Pharaoh <WH6547> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that the rain <WH4306> and the hail <WH1259> and the thunders <WH6963> were ceased <WH2308> <WH8804>, he sinned <WH2398> <WH8800> yet more <WH3254> <WH8686>, and hardened <WH3513> <WH8686> his heart <WH3820>, he and his servants <WH5650>.

And the heart <WH3820> of Pharaoh <WH6547> was hardened <WH2388> <WH8799>, neither would he let the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> go <WH7971> <WH8765>; as the YY <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> by <WH3027> Mosheh <WH4872>.
